function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Liquidity risk may cause work stoppage due to fragile economic scenario.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of private partnerships in building icccs may lead to security and privacy vulnerabilities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to consider migration patterns and isolation policies in the studies","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to wearing masks due to misinformation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to new materials","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of treatment or vaccine for sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on iot sensors for data collection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Job loss and exploitation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health outcomes modeled based on seir simulations incorporating demographic information.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependency on essential urban systems and primary services","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus transmission through close contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
